ComicInfo.Summary:
“SANCTUARY,” Part Two.
No’s suspicions about Sanctuary get stronger as we see that something dark and dangerous is living inside the walls. Cover A is part one of four interlocking covers.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Kyle Strahm & Felipe Sobreiro | 1 | | B | Cover B | John Bivens & Felipe Sobreiro | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Sanctuary Part Two
